page.title: 16ATTITUDES
page.content: THE CHILDREN WANTED TO TALK TO OLDER PEOPLE TO DISCOVER WHAT THEIR ATTITUDE WAS TO LIFE IN A NEW BUSTLING TOWN. IN PARTICULAR THEY LOOKED FOR PEOPLE WHO HAD SOME MEMORIES OF WHAT THE AREA USED TO BE LIKE BEFORE THE MASSIVE DEVELOPMENT. IN GENERAL THE OLDER GENERATION WERE NOT TOO HAPPY WITH MANY ASPECTS OF MODERN LIFE IN BASILDON. "WE HAD A VERY GOOD COMMUNITY LIFE BEFOR ETHE NEW TOWN CAME. ALTHOUGH THERE WERN'T MANY SHOPS WE NEVER LACKED FOR ANYTHING. VANS WOULD DELIVER ALL ESSENTIALS, BAKER, BUTCHER,FISHMONGER,GROCER, PARAFFIN-MAN."
